body.p: “Among R’s books in Bewick’s ‘Aesop’s Fabels.’ On a leaf succeeding the title-page is engraved a facsimile of B.’s handwriting to the following effect:
‘Newcastle “,” January “,” 1824. To Thomas Bewick & Son Dr.
To a Demy Copy of Aesop’s Fables ‘ 18 ‘
Then there was some fine red sea-moss adhering to the page just over the view of a distant church and windmill (probably Newcastle by moonlight “,” and at the bottom of the page: --
It being the impression of his thumb.”
PE 9, pg. 469 / 3 Sept 1854 – 12 May 1855 / NNPM MA 1302:24 / T vol. # XVIV / PDF # XIII
